dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The future supply routes reviewed in this study are based on data gathered from technical reports and environmental impact assessment reports of several lithium mining and processing companies (Lithium Americas Corp., Minera Salar Blanco, Nemaska Lithium Inc., and Keliber Oy) that are at various stages of developing their lithium assets. These are considered future supply routes as they are not yet active but areexpected to be operational in 5–10 years. technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The future supply routes for spodumene are described in technical reports of operations at the Whabouchi site, Canada and the Central Ostrobothnia region, Finland. While neither Canada nor Finland are among the countries with the largest lithium reserves (USGS, 2021), they represent examples of new lithium supplies that might become exploited in response to increased lithium demand. The average lithium concentration in spodumene at the Whabouchi site is about 0.7% and in Central Ostrobothnia region it is 0.6%. In these future supply routes, concentrated spodumene is directly converted to LiOH⋅H2O without producing Li2CO3 as an intermediate. The datasets representing mining operations in Canada and Finland are based on the technical reports prepared for Nemaska Lithium Inc. (Golder Associates, 2013; Laferri´ere et al., 2012; Nemaska Lithium Inc., 2013; SENES Consultants Ltd., 2013) and Keliber Oy (Keliber Oy, 2020a, b; Sweco, 2016), respectively. Specific data for chemical inputs was not available for the LiOH⋅H2O production unit process (from concentrated spodumene) in the Nemaska Lithium reports. Therefore, the chemical usage in the Keliber Oy reports were used as proxy data when comparing the different lithium supplies.

加拿大 Whabouchi 矿区和芬兰中部 Ostrobothnia 地区的运营技术报告中描述了未来的闪锌矿供应路线。虽然加拿大和芬兰都不是锂储量最大的国家（美国地质调查局，2021 年），但它们代表了新锂供应的范例，可能会随着锂需求的增加而被开采。Whabouchi矿区的钠长石中平均锂浓度约为0.7%，而在中奥斯特罗布特尼亚地区则为0.6%。在这些未来的供应路线中，浓缩的磷灰石会直接转化为 LiOH⋅H2O，而不会产生 Li2CO3 作为中间产物。代表加拿大和芬兰采矿作业的数据集分别基于为内玛斯卡锂业公司（Golder Associates，2013 年；Laferri´ere 等人，2012 年；内玛斯卡锂业公司，2013 年；SENES 咨询有限公司，2013 年）和 Keliber Oy（Keliber Oy，2020a，b；Sweco，2016 年）编写的技术报告。在内玛斯卡锂业公司的报告中，没有关于锂OH⋅H2O 生产单元工艺（来自浓缩锂辉石）的化学品投入的具体数据。因此，在比较不同的锂供应时，Keliber Oy 报告中的化学品用量被用作替代数据。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the industrial process for the production of lithium spodumene concentrate with a lithium oxide (Li2O) content of 6% from raw spodumene ore with a lithium oxide content of 0.7%, obtained specifically from the Whabouchi mining site in Canada. The process includes a crushing step to produce the concentrate. This concentrate is primarily used as a raw material for the production of lithium compounds, which are essential for various applications such as lithium-ion batteries, ceramics, glass, and grease lubricants.
本数据集代表从加拿大Whabouchi矿区采集的锂辉石原矿（含0.7%氧化锂）生产含6%氧化锂的锂辉石精矿的工业过程。该过程包含一个粉碎步骤以产生精矿。此精矿主要作为生产锂化合物的原材料，这些化合物对于制造锂离子电池、陶瓷、玻璃和润滑脂等多种应用至关重要。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should note that it specifically excludes the production processes of raw materials and associated energy flows that contribute less than 1%, and therefore may not represent the full environmental impacts of raw material extraction and processing. To ensure proper lifecycle assessment, users should complement this data with additional information on ancillary processes and minor energy flows if they fall within the scope of the LCA study. Moreover, users should make sure that their boundary conditions for the assessment are consistent with the system boundaries and exclusions set forth by this data set.
使用此数据集的用户应注意，它特别排除了原材料生产过程及其相关能源流量（贡献少于1%），因此可能未能代表原材料提取和加工的全部环境影响。为确保正确进行生命周期评估，如果它们属于LCA研究范围，用户应补充有关辅助过程和少量能源流的额外信息。此外，用户应确保其评估的边界条件与此数据集所规定的系统边界和排除事项一致。
